channel.title: Question on MoparScape 3.2 item codes 58.22.101.138
channel.description:
I got a list of item codes, but how do I use it? If it is something to do with commands, please give me an example with partyhats. (please use _ to represent spaces)
Also, can I change spellbooks in MoparScape? If I can, please teach me how.
Thx thx thx :)
